name: Silentium 2D
description: Silentium 2D is a fun, classy, arcade based game which puts you and a friend in a 1v1 arena. Loosely inspired by Halo, this game uses simple controls so that anyone can pick it up, and sci-fi aesthetic to add to the experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 1000 MB available space
